Class MovieDataController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.controllers.MovieDataController
public class MovieDataController extends Object
Controller that handles all movie data related application logic.
Author:
janii, Make, kian

    • fetchMoviesResponse

      public MoviesResponse fetchMoviesResponse(String url) throws org.apache.hc.client5.http.HttpResponseException
      Fetches the movies response from the given URL.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL to fetch the movies response from
      Returns:
      the MoviesResponse object containing the list of movies
      Throws:
      org.apache.hc.client5.http.HttpResponseException - if there is an error in the HTTP response

    • fetchStreamingProviders

      public void fetchStreamingProviders() throws org.apache.hc.client5.http.HttpResponseException
      Fetches the streaming providers and filters them based on predefined provider IDs.
      Throws:
      org.apache.hc.client5.http.HttpResponseException - if there is an error in the HTTP response

    • addStreamingProviders

      private void addStreamingProviders(List<Movie> movieList) throws org.apache.hc.client5.http.HttpResponseException
      Adds streaming provider information to the list of movies.
      Parameters:
      movieList - the list of movies to add streaming provider information to
      Throws:
      org.apache.hc.client5.http.HttpResponseException - if there is an error in fetching the streaming providers

    • fetchMovieDetails

      public void fetchMovieDetails(Movie movie)
      Fetches detailed information for a given movie and sets it in the movie object.

      movie - the movie object to fetch details for

      Throws:
      org.apache.hc.client5.http.HttpResponseException - if there is an error in the HTTP response

    • fetchSpokenLanguages

      public List<SpokenLanguage> fetchSpokenLanguages(String url) throws org.apache.hc.client5.http.HttpResponseException
      Fetches the list of spoken languages from the given URL and filters them based on predefined languages.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL to fetch the spoken languages from
      Returns:
      the list of filtered spoken languages
      Throws:
      org.apache.hc.client5.http.HttpResponseException - if there is an error in the HTTP response
